definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: act stormily, boisterously, arrogantly (Sir 13:8, NH id., Hiph. make proud (rare), Targum [[רְהֵב]] be arrogant; As. ra’âbu, storm at (angrily); Ar. rahiba be alarmed, frightened; Syr. rhab, Pe. Pt. trembling, hastening, Aph. terrify, hasten);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִרְחֲבוּ הַנַּעַר]] [[בַּזָּקֵן]] Is 3:5 (‖[[וְנִגַּשׂ ]]) storm against (LXX provko/yei); Imv. [[ךָ]]([[י]])[[רְהַב רֵעֶ]] Pr 6:3 beset, importune, thy friend (Perles:Anal. 61 conj. [[רְהַן]] give surety, cf. NH [[הרהין]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. sf. [[הִרְהִיבָֻנִי]] Ct So 6:5, of eyes, dub.: alarm me Hi Ew Bu, awe me Gi, disturb, confuse me, Oettli Dr:Intr. 419 (446) Buhl; Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[תַּרְהִבֵנִי]] Ps 138:3 (sibj. ´[[י]]:), Buhl Bae Dr thou makest me proud, bold (Thes De Che denom. of [[רׂהַב]]).
